author: geirm
msg: Pluggable Directive to handle the Velocimacro definition #macro( name arg1 arg2 ...).  Used inline in parsing to process and register the VM.  Does not render any output or init itself or its AST.

author: geirm
msg: Added the specification of the VM_global_library as an example.  There should be no problems if the file doesn't exist.

author: geirm
msg: Sorry!  Not convinced the log message is getting through.  Added VM support.

author: geirm
msg: Main VM manager class. VMs are registered here, and it produces VM instances for use in templates.  Pretty straightforward, and should be MT safe, although I haven't beaten it too hard.  Wanted to get codebase in first.
